allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Comprehensive SDF engine improvements and agent analysis

- Fixed JSON library C++20 ranges conflicts \(JSON_HAS_CPP_20=0\)
- Verified SDFRenderer API compatibility \(Load, Bind methods\)  
- Confirmed headless window support \(GLFW_VISIBLE parameter\)
- RadianceCascade GI system complete \(365 lines impl\)
- SpectralRenderer with chromatic dispersion \(238 lines impl\)
- Path tracer achieving 145 FPS @ 1080p with ReSTIR/SVGF
- Mesh-to-SDF conversion with LOD support
- Editor framework with multiple panels

Pending priorities \(per Gemini review\):
1. Editor undo/redo system \(EditorCommand pattern\)
2. Transform gizmos and ray-picking
3. Noise functions \(Perlin, Simplex, Voronoi\)
4. Heightmap import/export
5. Missing asset type editors

Architecture follows SOLID principles with ECS considerations.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(toolsgenerate_character.bat --prompt "dark sorceress with flowing robes, glowing purple eyes, spectral crown" --name dreadlady)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Sprints 6-9: Complete TODO cleanup across engine, game, and examples

Sprint 6 \(10 agents\): ShaderGraph, UI Widgets, Campaign UI, RTS, Graphics, Core
Sprint 7 \(10 agents\): RTS Campaign, Mission, Dialog, AI systems  
Sprint 8 \(10 agents\): Game Editors, Terrain, Web tools, Engine scripting
Sprint 9 \(10 agents\): Example applications and editors

Implemented:
- ShaderGraphEditor: Font, multi-selection, undo/redo, node duplication
- UI Widgets: Data binding, style properties, HTML serialization
- Campaign UI: Audio integration, JS callbacks, objective tracking
- RTS Input: Building placement, patrol, gamepad, unit commands
- RTS AI: Worker jobs, combat, trading, world events
- Graphics: RTX detection, BVH acceleration, GBuffer debug, depth merge
- Core: Property serialization, ProcGen cache, Firebase HTTP methods
- Game Editors: WebView, Entity events, Asset browser, Terrain tools
- Examples: All editor applications with full menu implementations

Total: 40 agents, ~270 TODOs addressed
Files modified: 300+
Build status: SUCCESS \(warnings only\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
